topic.title: ESCALATION IN LEVEL OF PATIENT CARE FOLLOWING OESOPHAGECTOMY INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether there was an escalation in the CRITICAL CARE LEVEL required for the PATIENT following an Oesophagectomy (the surgical removal of all or part of the oesophagus) during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
